entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of light snow beginning near midnight. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 before morning. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
